data.text: @soofeeuhh @Casey_Mac15 @enews Am truly sorry you had bad experience in past in behalf of ARMY.

@Casey_Mac15 @enews Our ARMY is international, many of them translate the songs for us. 
so you can always find the lyrics to their songs. they always have beautiful meanings , here is example of the lyric videos (many of these are translated in 50+ languages) https://t.co/82X82NIaxk

@Casey_Mac15 @enews This is the level of performance we expected from @BBMAs 
https://t.co/HGjDOIfgg9

@Casey_Mac15 @enews its not there fault that #BBMAs edit a lot of the rap line because some of the words could be misunderstood , so to avoid controversy or misunderstanding, they muted those parts. but check out what they actually sound like live/here is past performance

https://t.co/nYjC71l9E3

@enews What would happened if @BTS_twt went to ARMY without fences? Yes there are those fans taking things to far, but there is way more ARMY that are protective of BTS & we would Never harm them. instead check how great ARMY is protects them #PurpleRibbonProject https://t.co/7sAtDpaDTq
@Casey_Mac15 @enews Wow I’m not sure you want a bunch of armys on this post substantiating bts’ glory and proving u wrong on all the things u said about bts, so better delete tweet now.
